events.message: I recently purchased a smartphone from your store, but it arrived with several scratches and is not functioning as expected. I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on a damaged product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the scratched and defective smartphone.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the condition of your smartphone. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide us with the order number and photos of the damaged smartphone so we can verify the issue and proceed accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached clear photos showing the scratches on the screen and the back cover. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for providing the details. We can process a full refund for your purchase. Please send the product back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund option. I appreciate the prepaid label to return the product. I'll send it back today.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear in your bank account within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
